clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Bacopa Monnieri on Working Memory and Cognitive Processing in Student

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine the effect of Bacopa Monnieri on working memory and cognitive processing in student.

detailed_description.textblock: Learning and working memory are two of the key role for studying and work successful for student particular the high school student who study hard and preparing themselves for the graduate study. The consumption of brain booster product or functional food for improving memory has gained much attention. It has been reported that Bacopa Monnieri could improve learning and working memory in elderly subject by improving the N100 and P300 event related potential. Therefore, Bacopa Monnieri might be the potential product for improving the learning and working memory in student particular high school student.

primary_outcome.measure: Cognitive processing using the latency of P300 wave
primary_outcome.description: The latency of P300 wave was measured and expressed as millisecond.

primary_outcome.measure: Cognitive processing using the amplitude of P300 wave
primary_outcome.description: The amplitude of P300 wave was measured and expressed as micro-volt.

primary_outcome.measure: Attention using the latency of N100 wave
primary_outcome.description: The latency of N100 wave was measured and expressed as millisecond.

primary_outcome.measure: Attention using the amplitude of N100 wave
primary_outcome.description: The amplitude of N100 wave was measured and expressed as micro-volt.

secondary_outcome.measure: Accuracy of working memory using computerized battery test
secondary_outcome.description: The accuracy of working memory was determined and expressed as percentage.

secondary_outcome.measure: Speed of working memory using computerized battery test
secondary_outcome.description: The speed of working memory was determined and expressed as millisecond.

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of psychiatric symptoms using the symptom check list 90 (SCL-90)
Assessment of mood scale using Bond-Lader visual analogue scales
Glutamic acid decarboxylase (GAD) activity in serum
Activity of superoxide dismutase in serum
Activity of glutathione peroxidase in serum
Consumption safety of Bacopa Monnieri using electrocardiogram (EKG)
Consumption safety of Bacopa Monnieri using hematological values .
secondary_outcome.description: The hematological values including red blood cell, white blood cell, hematocrit and platelet were determined and the data was expressed as number of subject presented with abnormal hematological value.

secondary_outcome.measure: Consumption safety of Bacopa Monnieri using blood chemistry
secondary_outcome.description: The blood chemistry values including renal function test, liver function test, lipid profile, electrolytes and glucose were determined and the data was expressed as number of subject presented with abnormal blood chemistry value.

secondary_outcome.measure: Consumption safety of Bacopa Monnieri using blood pressure measurement

arm_group.description: Subjects are received the pill of placebo which has same color, shape and smell like the Bacopa Monnieri once daily for 16 weeks.
Subjects are received the pill of Bacopa Monnieri at the dose of 300 mg/day once daily for 16 weeks
Subjects are received the pill of Bacopa Monnieri at the dose of 600 mg/day once daily for 16 weeks

intervention.description: Subjects are received Placebo once daily for 16 weeks.
Subjects are received Bacopa Monnieri at the dose of 300 mg/day once daily for 16 weeks.
Subjects are received Bacopa Monnieri at the dose of 600 mg/day once daily for 16 weeks.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy student subject aged between 15-18 years old who studying in the school within Khon Kaen province.
- Body mass index is between 18.5-24.9
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subjects who are diagnosed with one of the following: cardiovascular diseases, respiratory disease, neuropsychological diseases, head injury, diabetes mellitus, liver disease, cancer, autoimmune disease and hematological disorder are excluded.
- Subjects who take any medicine or nutraceuticals or hormone that effect on central nervous system are excluded.
- Alcohol addict or smoking addiction (more than 10 pieces/day)
- Athlete or subjects who have a regular exercise more than 3 times/week
- Subjects who don't follow the instruction during the trial
- Subjects who are participating the other project.
